metadata.title: Authorised person travelling with a pet from Great Britain to Northern Ireland

contact.phone:
Pet Travel helpline  
Telephone: 0370 241 1710  
Monday to Friday, 8.30am to 5pm (closed on bank holidays)  
[Find out about call charges](https://www.gov.uk/call-charges)

email.responseTime: We aim to respond within 5 working days

draft.name: Authorised person travelling with a pet from Great Britain to Northern Ireland

components.name: textField
components.title: What's your name?
components.hint: Your name must be the same as it is on your Pet Travel Document.

pages.title: What's the Pet Travel Document number?

components.name: JJzDYZ
components.title: Pet Travel document number
components.hint:
The pet owner should have provided you with this number. It must match the number written on the Pet Travel Document 
exactly.

The Pet travel  number should be 11 characters long, starting with 'GB826' followed by a mix of numbers and letters. For example, GB826A1B2C3.

options.customValidationMessage: The Pet travel  number should be 11 characters long, starting with 'GB826' followed by a mix of numbers and letters. For example, GB826A1B2C3.

pages.title: What's name of the pet owner?

draft.declaration:
I declare that:

  • I am the person nominated by the pet owner to travel with their pet
  • the answers I have given are true and correct to the best of my knowledge
  • I understand that I can travel with this pet to and from Northern Ireland only and not to an EU member state (the Republic of Ireland is an EU member state)
  • I am not taking the animal as part of a commercial movement
  • I have read and understood the Pet travel scheme privacy notice (opens new tab)
